metadata.title: CVE-2017-15281 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
ReadPSDImage in coders/psd.c in ImageMagick 7.0.7-6 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted file, related to "Conditional jumpor move depends on uninitialised value(s)."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15281` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.11').
